_comment: This file is generated. Please edit .homeycompose/app.json instead.

hint.en: This flowcard will contain a known person token (Dual doorbell / Homebase 3 only)
hint.nl: Deze flowkaart bevat een bekend persoon token (Alleen voor Dual deurbel en Homebase 3)
hint.fr: Cette carte de flux contiendra un jeton de personne connue (sonnette double / Homebase 3 uniquement)

title.fr: La diffusion en direct a commenc√©

titleFormatted.fr: La diffusion en direct a commenc√©

hint.en: This flowcard will trigger after the 'Start stream' flowcard was used
hint.nl: Deze flowkaart zal afvuren nadat de 'Start stream' flowkaart gebruikt is

titleFormatted.en: Turn lens to [[action_CMD_INDOOR_PAN_TURN_PTZ_TYPE]],  repeat this [[repeat]] times
titleFormatted.nl: Draai lens naar [[action_CMD_INDOOR_PAN_TURN_PTZ_TYPE]], herhaal dit [[repeat]] keer

titleFormatted.fr: D√©finir le mode de protection en [[action_CMD_SET_ARM_TYPE]]

hint.en: Enable the snapshot feature in the device settings. (max allowed snapshots per day: 30)

title.fr: Prendre une capture d'√©cran (utiliser un service auto-h√©berg√©)

titleFormatted.fr: Prendre une capture d'√©cran (utiliser un service auto-h√©berg√©: [[url]])

hint.en: Enable the snapshot feature in the device settings. Instead of using the cloud service for taking Snapshots you can use a selfhosted service. Go to https://tinyurl.com/eufy-homey Q13 for more information.

titleFormatted.en: Turn generic alarm on for [[action_CMD_TRIGGER_ALARM_TIME]] seconds
titleFormatted.nl: Zet algemeen alarm aan voor [[action_CMD_TRIGGER_ALARM_TIME]] seconden

hint.en: This alarm will trigger when a detection happens. (Motion/Person/Sound). This generic alarm also allows zone activity and by enabling this you can use the Eufy motion detections as a sensor in Heimdall

hint.en: NOTE: The snapshot card will use a external service which runs FFMPEG to generate the snapshot. This service is hosted by the developer of this app and is free to use.
